verses.sanskrit:
मनोबुद्ध्यहङ्कार चित्तानि नाहं
न च श्रोत्रजिह्वे न च घ्राणनेत्रे।
न च व्योम भूमिर्न तेजो न वायुः
चिदानन्दरूपः शिवोऽहम् शिवोऽहम्॥
verses.transliteration:
manobuddhyahaṅkāra cittāni nāhaṃ
na ca śrotrajihve na ca ghrāṇanetre।
na ca vyoma bhūmirna tejo na vāyuḥ
cidānandarūpaḥ śivo'ham śivo'ham॥
verses.meaning: I am not the mind, intellect, ego or memory. I am not the ears, tongue, nose or eyes. I am not space, earth, fire, air or ether. I am pure consciousness and bliss. I am Shiva, I am Shiva.

verses.sanskrit:
न च प्राणसंज्ञो न वै पञ्चवायुः
न वा सप्तधातुर्न वा पञ्चकोशः।
न वाक्पाणिपादं न चोपस्थपायु
चिदानन्दरूपः शिवोऽहम् शिवोऽहम्॥
verses.transliteration:
na ca prāṇasaṃjño na vai pañcavāyuḥ
na vā saptadhāturna vā pañcakośaḥ।
na vākpāṇipādaṃ na copasthapāyu
cidānandarūpaḥ śivo'ham śivo'ham॥
verses.meaning: I am not the vital breath, nor the five vital airs. I am not the seven constituents of the body, nor the five sheaths. I am not the organ of speech, hands, feet, nor organs of procreation and excretion. I am pure consciousness and bliss. I am Shiva, I am Shiva.

verses.sanskrit:
न मे द्वेषरागौ न मे लोभमोहौ
मदो नैव मे नैव मात्सर्यभावः।
न धर्मो न चार्थो न कामो न मोक्षः
चिदानन्दरूपः शिवोऽहम् शिवोऽहम्॥
verses.transliteration:
na me dveṣarāgau na me lobhamohau
mado naiva me naiva mātsaryabhāvaḥ।
na dharmo na cārtho na kāmo na mokṣaḥ
cidānandarūpaḥ śivo'ham śivo'ham॥
verses.meaning: I have neither aversion nor attachment, neither greed nor delusion. I have neither pride nor jealousy. I am beyond dharma and artha, kama and moksha. I am pure consciousness and bliss. I am Shiva, I am Shiva.

verses.sanskrit:
न पुण्यं न पापं न सौख्यं न दुःखं
न मन्त्रो न तीर्थं न वेदा न यज्ञाः।
अहं भोजनं नैव भोज्यं न भोक्ता
चिदानन्दरूपः शिवोऽहम् शिवोऽहम्॥
verses.transliteration:
na puṇyaṃ na pāpaṃ na saukhyaṃ na duḥkhaṃ
na mantro na tīrthaṃ na vedā na yajñāḥ।
ahaṃ bhojanaṃ naiva bhojyaṃ na bhoktā
cidānandarūpaḥ śivo'ham śivo'ham॥
verses.meaning: I am neither virtue nor sin, neither pleasure nor pain. I am not mantra, pilgrimage, Vedas or sacrifices. I am neither food, nor the one who eats, nor the act of eating. I am pure consciousness and bliss. I am Shiva, I am Shiva.

verses.sanskrit:
न मृत्युर्न शङ्का न मे जातिभेदः
पिता नैव मे नैव माता न जन्म।
न बन्धुर्न मित्रं गुरुर्नैव शिष्यः
चिदानन्दरूपः शिवोऽहम् शिवोऽहम्॥
verses.transliteration:
na mṛtyurna śaṅkā na me jātibhedaḥ
pitā naiva me naiva mātā na janma।
na bandhurna mitraṃ gururnaiva śiṣyaḥ
cidānandarūpaḥ śivo'ham śivo'ham॥
verses.meaning: I have neither death nor fear, nor any distinction of caste. I have no father, no mother, no birth. I have no relatives, no friends, no guru, no disciple. I am pure consciousness and bliss. I am Shiva, I am Shiva.

verses.sanskrit:
अहं निर्विकल्पो निराकाररूपो
विभुत्वाच्च सर्वत्र सर्वेन्द्रियाणाम्।
न चासङ्गतं नैव मुक्तिर्न मेयः
चिदानन्दरूपः शिवोऽहम् शिवोऽहम्॥
verses.transliteration:
ahaṃ nirvikalpo nirākārarūpo
vibhutvācca sarvatra sarvendriyāṇām।
na cāsaṅgataṃ naiva muktirna meyaḥ
cidānandarūpaḥ śivo'ham śivo'ham॥
verses.meaning: I am without thought or form. I am all-pervading, beyond all senses. I have neither attachment nor liberation, neither measurable nor knowable. I am pure consciousness and bliss. I am Shiva, I am Shiva.
